content.description: Start on the block below the roof and climb out the left side on cool holds.  There is a definitive thrutchy crux getting to the lip.  Could be easier for the taller.
content.protection: A few pads.  Falls of the last move were violent for me and the landing is not perfect.
content.location: Walk up the CCC trail and once you reach the first cliff band head left into the talus about 100yards and look for the roofy boulder.  The roof faces west.

content.description: Starting on the boulder beneath the roof, climb out the right side of the roof on good holds.  The mantle is the crux.  Probably harder if you're shorter.
content.protection: A few pads, the landing isn't very good for the mantle.  A spot too.
content.location: Walk up the CCC trail and once you reach the first cliff band head left into the talus and walk 100 yards.  The roof faces west.  Sea of Purple climbs out the left side.

content.description: In the middle of the boulder field
